concept.title: Compression
concept.shortdesc: You can use Gzip, Bzip2, Snappy, LZO and other compression formats with the Hadoop FS destination. To use LZO compression with the destination, you need to configure the to enable LZO compression.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS destinationcompressioncompressionfor the Hadoop FS destinationMake sure updates in this topic get into the Local FS version. All other compression formats do not require additional configuration.

Due to JVM limitations, you can use LZO compression with only one version of Hadoop FS. If you installed multiple libraries that include the Hadoop FS destination, make sure to configure the to use compression with the version that you want to use. need to add Local FS above?
